name: Junkyard Robot
description: Enjoy this single player driver challenge game. Play both downhill mountain races with off-road trucks ready to bounce over any obstacle. Competition is provided by AI competitors who will not hesitate to cut you off or knock you out of their way. Rubbing is racing.  The third course features an indoor obstacle style track time challenge. For this course your vehicle is an open topped turbo charged dune buggy. This release features the ability to switch between two distinct controls for game play. Tilt controlled steering with accelerator and brake or D-Pad controls for steering combined with gas/brake. Multiple camera angles can be selected on each level as well.
